title: Futbol Americas: USSF release findings of the Yates investigation
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar are joined by Jeff Carlisle to discuss U.S. Soccer's investigation into women's systemic abuse and misconduct. What is USSF's responsibility in all this? Also, the guys recap the weekend action in MLS, Liga MX and NWSL. Who made the playoffs in Liga MX and NWSL?
